text: The 2000 HEW Cyclassics was the fifth edition of the HEW Cyclassics cycle race and was held on 6 August 2000. The race started and finished in Hamburg. The race was won by Gabriele Missaglia. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 0" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 2" |} |} ==References== 2000 Category:2000 in German sport Hew Cyclassics Category:August 2000 sports events in Europe
